name: @n8n/n8n-nodes-langchain.googleGemini
semantic_context: Interact with Google Gemini AI models

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Analyze Video
options.description: Take in videos and answer questions about them

options.name: Generate a Video
options.description: Creates a video from a text prompt

options.name: Download Video
options.description: Download a generated video from the Google Gemini API using a URL

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

inputType.name: inputType
inputType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

audioUrls.name: audioUrls
audioUrls.description: URL(s) of the audio(s) to transcribe, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
audioUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

binaryPropertyName.name: binaryPropertyName
binaryPropertyName.hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be processed
binaryPropertyName.description: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the video(s), seperate multiple field names with commas
binaryPropertyName.ai_hint: Name of the binary field(s) which contains the video(s), seperate multiple field names with commas

simplify.name: simplify
simplify.description: Whether to simplify the response or not

options.name: options
durationSeconds
options.description: Length of the generated video in seconds. Supported only by certain models.

options.name: Widescreen (16:9)
options.description: Most common aspect ratio for televisions and monitors

options.name: Portrait (9:16)
options.description: Popular for short-form videos like YouTube Shorts

options.name: Don't Allow
options.description: Prevent generation of people in the video

options.name: Allow Adult
options.description: Allow generation of adult people in the video

options.name: Allow All
options.description: Allow generation of all people in the video

options.name: binaryPropertyOutput
options.hint: The name of the output field to put the binary file data in

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

documentUrls.name: documentUrls
documentUrls.description: URL(s) of the document(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
documentUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

fileUrl.name: fileUrl
fileUrl.description: URL of the file to upload
fileUrl.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

imageUrls.name: imageUrls
imageUrls.description: URL(s) of the image(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
imageUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.placeholder: e.g. Panning wide shot of a calico kitten sleeping in the sunshine
prompt.description: A text description of the desired video
prompt.ai_hint: A text description of the desired video

images.name: images
images.description: Add one or more binary fields to include images with your prompt

values.name: binaryPropertyName
values.description: The name of the binary field containing the image data

images.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

messages.name: messages

values.name: content
values.description: The content of the message to be send
values.placeholder: e.g. Hello, how can you help me?

values.name: role
values.description: Role in shaping the model's response, it tells the model how it should behave and interact with the user

options.name: User
options.description: Send a message as a user and get a response from the model

options.name: Model
options.description: Tell the model to adopt a specific tone or personality

messages.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

jsonOutput.name: jsonOutput
jsonOutput.description: Whether to attempt to return the response in JSON format

videoUrls.name: videoUrls
videoUrls.description: URL(s) of the video(s) to analyze, multiple URLs can be added separated by comma
videoUrls.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

url.name: url
url.description: The URL from Google Gemini API to download the video from
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

returnAs.name: returnAs
returnAs.description: Whether to return the video as a binary file or a URL that can be used to download the video later
returnAs.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'audioUrls'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'audioUrls'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'transcribe' AND resource == 'audio' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'documentUrls'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'document' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'fileUrl'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'upload' AND resource == 'file' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'inputType'
IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'imageUrls'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'edit' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'edit' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF operation == 'edit' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'images'
IF operation == 'edit' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'image' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'messages'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonOutput'
IF operation == 'message' AND resource == 'text' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'text'

IF inputType == 'url' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'videoUrls'
IF inputType == 'binary' AND operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryPropertyName'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'simplify'
IF operation == 'analyze' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'modelId'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'prompt'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAs'
IF operation == 'generate' AND resource == 'video' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
